mapper.select:
select
from P_POS_HUDDLE_REWARD where huddle_code in(select huddle_code from POS_HUDDLE_REWARD_DETAIL where pos_agent_id = '${agentId}')
and APPLY_STATUS = '${applyStatus}'
and TOTAL_CONS_MONTH $lt;= '${profitMonth}' and CREDIT_CONS_MONTH >= '${profitMonth}'
and REV1 = '00'
